root.name: Witches
root.description: SummaryPlay as Tempest, Fire or Shadow, three female witches in tight, revealing and shiny medieval armor while struggling for survival in this medieval land against hordes of The Beast,Â these satanic, demonic and deformed beasts who roam across the land and kill without mercy.Characters will combat dozens and even hundreds of monsters in 80 scenarios using a large variety of weapons, ranging from blunt to sharp medieval weapons. As well as spells and even amputated limbs of adversaries. Witches Tempest, Fire and Shadow have specific strenghs and weaknesses which the player is required to cooperatively use them to escape various scenarios of the game. The game has two modes, Requiem and Arena, different endings will be unlocked depending on the decisions made during the playthrough.
